body: @zikakuto I don't know what other one you're talking about. Also, Chitose doesn't get off on Hori watching her as most of the time he's not even watching her...she just tightens up at the MERE mention of him. Everything points at her just going along with Taka(as Mika said) and having feelings for Hori. You TakaxChitose people need to stop reading with your fucking asses, apparently.

So far what we’ve seen is that Chitose is attracted to Takayuki and  gets off on the thought of being watched by Hori, it seems she is a slut who enjoys being watched while getting fucked . She doesn’t seem to really be attracted to Hori besides just friendzoning him and using him for her fetish of being watched while fucked. Like the sister said, Chitose doesn’t want to see herself as a slut but deep down she knows she is one. She wants to be fucked by anyone other than Hori. Seto Yuuki’s NTR stories don’t follow the typical generic NTR story beats. His characters don’t follow those NTR mindbreak tropes. So far what we’ve seen is that Chitose is attracted to Hori or gets off on the thought of Hori catching her having sex, it seems just hearing his name makes her tighten up and get aroused. She doesn’t seem to really be attracted to Takayuki besides just dating him and going along with his sexual urges for the time being. 

I might be wrong, Chitose’s true feelings are left ambiguous because we can’t hear her inner thoughts. And although we keep getting these panels that imply she actually likes Hori, it’s never confirmed and could just be red herrings. Personally, I think it’s really good stuff, I feel bad for Hori and it’s not like more typical NTR where you can’t take the characters seriously and don’t feel anything for them. I’m hoping again for a good satisfying ending whichever way they go. Also Seto Yuuki followed me back on Twitter! Go follow himxD

When Hori tried to confess to Chitose on the roof, Chitose stopping him and telling him that she's currenly dating with Takayuki. And she said "At least dating for the time being". Then when Hori goes to the salon, Chitose's mom told to him that while the summer holiday; Chitose's been teaching an underclassman for a while. He's been going here everyday for that "teaching". And yeah that's it

Chitose's been turning into a bitch since the last chapt, man. Again, feel so sorry for the MC.

@asjdnaosndoasjnd Exactly what I was thinking bruh. People that are saying it’s gonna end very badly makes me think they’re solely judging the outcome based on this chapter and forgetting the build-up in the previous three. MC may not get fan service ending like some want, but I don’t see this ending horribly for him considering his response to what’s going on. Only way this ends badly is if Author just says fuck it and throws away all logic and development to make a forced ending which just wouldn’t be smart on his part.

Also a bad ending for Hori seems out of the window. because "Punished Hori" doesn't seem to give much fuck anymore. He knows what is happening, he got rejected and doesn't care to much about Mika, so he cannot get cucked again. I think he's gonna get another shot at Chitose with Mika's help. Chitose herself on the other hand knows Hori's feelings now, reacts eroticly every time he's around and shows big relief when he said he's gonna remain in the club. I don't know, either they finally end up together or it's something unexpected. If it was going to be a sad end you could literally end it with last panel of chapter 4, without the need to write the next one. Hori going his own way and Takayuki being lovey-dovey with Chitose literally just happened. More of that seems redundant. I don't know, theres 1 chapter left, we'll have to see.

Those glances that Chitose and Hori had to each other in the previous chapters and the fact that she cums instantly when Hori shows up is interesting. I hope its explored, but it could just be red herrings or something. Also judging by the dialogue between the chads sister and Hori, she says to hori that Chitose is only getting with the chad because she thinks it would be slutty not to go out with the guy you've slept with, that's Chitose's reasoning according to the chads sister. So we'll see were it goes.
